mapper.select: SELECT T.TRADING_AT AS date, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN C.TYPE = 'INCOME' THEN T.AMOUNT ELSE 0 END), 0) AS totalIncome, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN C.TYPE = 'EXPENSE' THEN T.AMOUNT ELSE 0 END), 0) AS totalExpense FROM TRANSACTION T JOIN CATEGORY C ON T.CATEGORY_ID = C.CATEGORY_ID WHERE T.USER_ID = #{userId} AND T.TRADING_AT >= #{startDate} AND T.TRADING_AT <= #{endDate} GROUP BY T.TRADING_AT ORDER BY T.TRADING_AT

SELECT C.NAME AS categoryName, SUM(T.AMOUNT) AS totalAmount FROM TRANSACTION T JOIN CATEGORY C ON T.CATEGORY_ID = C.CATEGORY_ID WHERE T.USER_ID = #{userId} AND C.TYPE = 'EXPENSE' AND T.TRADING_AT >= #{startDate} AND T.TRADING_AT <= #{endDate} GROUP BY C.CATEGORY_ID, C.NAME ORDER BY totalAmount DESC
